https://tmrev.io/movie/376424-Beware the Slenderman 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f5W2nhbnzOR2aNa7vSpwWCzzAw2.jpg In this horrifyingly modern fairytale lurks an online Boogeyman and two 12-year-old girls who would kill for him. The entrance to the internet quickly leads to its darkest basement. How responsible are our children for what they find there? Beware the Slenderman
